About

I’m **Iker Elvi**, an audio engineer focused on **music production**, **post-production for film**, and **game audio**. Audio engineer and music producer currently studying at SAE Barcelona, transitioning from 10 years in software development. I bring a **technical and creative** approach to audio production, with experience in recording, mixing, mastering and sound design, along with a strong background in digital tools, automation and innovation. Music has always been an essential part of my life. As a guitarist and bassist, I have played in various bands and recorded studio albums, performing in renowned venues across Spain. This dual experience as a performer and producer allows me to approach sound with both precision and artistic sensitivity. - Certifications: **Wwise**, **Pro Tools**, **Ableton Live**, **DiGiCo SD Series** - Interests: recording, mixing/mastering, sound design, implementation If you want to collaborate or discuss opportunities: **ikersa92@gmail.com**.
